feature.label: Bioclipse-BridgeDb Update Site
feature.description: The Bioclipse-BridgeDb plugins makes the BridgeDb library accessible in the Bioclipse scripting environment.
feature.copyright: The BridgeDb Bioclipse plugin code is copyright Egon Willighagen, 2011. The BridgeDb library code is copyrighted by Martijn van Iersel et al.
feature.license: The BridgeDb Bioclipse plugin code is license EPL + GPL exception, like Bioclipse itself. The BridgeDb library code has the Apache 2.0 License.
